about_the_game:
Begin a thrilling journey through time with Nia, a brave young girl who finds herself transported to an ancient world filled with mysteries and dangers.

In this captivating platformer, you’ll venture into a past where myths and legends intertwine, guiding Nia on her quest to return home.

Trapped in this hostile world, Nia must navigate her way back by overcoming numerous trials, solving ancient puzzles, and dodging dangers at every turn. Explore mysterious ruins, uncover hidden artifacts, and tackle intricate mechanisms that can either be your salvation or doom.

Collect ancient artifacts, activate portals, and find the exit on each level to help Nia return to the modern world. Your wit, agility, and keen observation will be the keys to success in this remarkable adventure.

Key Features:

  • Atmospheric World: Explore a setting inspired by the ancient civilizations of Egypt and Greece.

  • Engaging Puzzles: Solve challenges rooted in myths and legends.

  • Exciting Levels: Conquer unique obstacles and trials.

  • Vibrant Graphics and Enchanting Music: Immerse yourself in the ancient world.

  • Intriguing Story: Experience a narrative full of unexpected twists and secrets.

Join Nia and uncover the secrets of ancient civilizations!

name: Nia: Jewel Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 6570 (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in an atmospheric world where a young girl named Nia is transported to an ancient realm. Solve puzzles, avoid dangers, collect artifacts, and activate portals to bring Nia back to the modern world. The challenges and mysteries of ancient civilizations await you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Ukrainian
